statements: SELECT stock_symbol, company_name, market_price FROM stock_market_data;
SELECT company_name, volume_traded, pe_ratio FROM stock_market_data;
SELECT market_cap, volume_traded, pe_ratio FROM stock_market_data WHERE market_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM stock_market_data WHERE market_cap > 1000000;
SELECT company_name, market_price, volume_traded FROM stock_market_data ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_market_data WHERE market_price > 100 ORDER BY company_name DESC, market_price ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT stock_symbol, company_name, pe_ratio FROM stock_market_data WHERE volume_traded > 1000000 ORDER BY pe_ratio DESC, market_cap ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT company_name, market_cap, pe_ratio FROM stock_market_data WHERE market_cap > 1000000000 ORDER BY market_cap DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT stock_symbol, market_price, volume_traded FROM stock_market_data WHERE pe_ratio < 15 ORDER BY market_price ASC, volume_traded DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT * FROM stock_market_data WHERE pe_ratio > 20 AND market_price < 50 ORDER BY pe_ratio DESC, market_price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM stock_data
SELECT symbol, price FROM stock_data WHERE price > 100
SELECT date, symbol, price FROM stock_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM user_investments WHERE investment < 5000
SELECT user_id, symbol, investment FROM user_investments
SELECT * FROM stock_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price FROM stock_data WHERE symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'MSFT') ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, symbol, investment FROM user_investments WHERE investment < 100000 ORDER BY user_id, date;
SELECT symbol, price, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM stock_data WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT symbol) AS num_symbols, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM stock_data;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM StockPrices
SELECT * FROM InvestmentOpportunities ORDER BY date_recommended DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, quantity, transaction_type FROM UserTransactions WHERE user_id = 'abc123'
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM StockPrices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT opportunity_id, stock_symbol, recommendation FROM InvestmentOpportunities
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM StockPrices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT opportunity_id, stock_symbol, recommendation FROM InvestmentOpportunities WHERE recommendation = 'Buy' ORDER BY date_recommended ASC
SELECT user_id, stock_symbol, quantity FROM UserTransactions WHERE quantity < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, timestamp, price FROM StockPrices WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT user_id, stock_symbol, transaction_type FROM UserTransactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND transaction_type = 'Sell' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM stock_prices
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 1000
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol='AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT name, email, country FROM user_info ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT symbol, company_name, sector, price FROM stock_info
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, close_price, volume FROM stock_prices WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY close_price DESC
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE country = 'USA' AND name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name
SELECT user_id, symbol, recommendation_type FROM recommendations ORDER BY user_id, symbol
SELECT s.symbol, si.company_name, si.sector, s.close_price FROM stock_prices s JOIN stock_info si ON s.symbol = si.symbol WHERE si.sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY s.close_price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM stock_data;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM stock_data ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_volume FROM stock_data WHERE stock_volume > 10000;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price, stock_volume FROM stock_data WHERE stock_price < 50 AND stock_volume > 5000 ORDER BY stock_volume ASC;
SELECT stock_name, close_price, date FROM stock_data JOIN stock_history ON stock_data.stock_id = stock_history.stock_id ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM stock_data WHERE stock_price > 100
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance FROM user_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High'
SELECT user_id, stock_id, shares_owned FROM user_portfolio ORDER BY shares_owned DESC
SELECT stock_id, date, open_price, close_price FROM stock_history WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT user_id, stock_id, recommendation FROM recommendation_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC
